name: ovssunirn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: eqsstri(co(c0, c1, c2), cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cuni(crn(c1)))
-| wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)))
-| wss(cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), cuni(crn(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cuni(crn(c1)))
-| wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)))
-| wss(cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), cuni(crn(c1)))

body.origin: |- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(co(c0, c1, c2), cuni(crn(c1)))
-| wss(cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), cuni(crn(c1)))

comment: The result of an operation value is always a subset of the union of the range. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2017.)
